text: Father of the Bride Part II is a 1995 American comedy movie starring Steve Martin, Diane Keaton and Martin Short. It is the sequel to Father of the Bride and a remake of the 1951 movie Father's Little Dividend, the sequel to the original Father of the Bride movie released in 1950. It received mixed reviews from critics. ==References== Category:1995 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Shyer Category:Midlife crisis movies
title: Father of the Bride Part II
